description: A man in a cowboy hat and vest is being propelled headfirst through a saloon's plate glass window, shattering it outwards. Simultaneously, two other men rapidly exit through the saloon's main swinging doors, looking agitated. In the immediate foreground, several horses stand facing away from the saloon entrance, their backsides dominating the view. The scene juxtaposes the mundane sight of horses waiting outside a saloon with the surreal event of a person being forcibly ejected through a window. This creates an absurd situation where extreme action is shown in a detached, almost observational manner.
